Enhance your browsing experience with the "Edit with Likee" Chrome extension! This handy tool adds a convenient option to your right-click context menu, allowing you to quickly navigate to Likee's video editing platform. Whether you're viewing a webpage, an image, or a video, you can easily access Likee and start editing with just a click.

Features:

Edit Pages: Right-click on any webpage and select "Edit with Likee" to be redirected to Likee's video platform.
Edit Images: Found an interesting image? Right-click and choose "Edit image with Likee" to jump straight to Likee.
Edit Videos: Easily edit videos by right-clicking and selecting "Edit video with Likee."
This extension is perfect for content creators, social media enthusiasts, or anyone who loves to edit videos quickly and easily.
